description.brazilian: Atenda com sucesso (!) até que a Riley volte.
description.english: Bartend succesfully (!) until Riley gets back.
description.german: Kümmere dich erfolgreich (!) um die Bar bis Riley zurück ist
description.latam: Haz cervezas y bebestibles con éxito (!) Hasta que Riley regrese.
description.russian: Успешно работать барменом (!), пока Райли не вернется.
description.schinese: 成功调酒（！），直到莱利回来。
description.turkish: Riley gelene kadar başarılı bir şekilde barmenlik yap.

description.brazilian: Não misture qualquer água na bebida dos clientes.
description.english: Don't mix beggar's drink any water.
description.german: Pansche deine Getränke nicht mit Wasser.
description.latam: No mezcles la bebida de mendigo con agua.
description.russian: Не смешивайте напиток нищего с водой.
description.schinese: 不在乞丐的饮料中掺任何水

description.brazilian: Derrote os piratas no Jogo de Faca.
description.english: Beat the pirates in Five Finger Fillet.
description.latam: Derrota a los piratas en Five Finger Fillet.
description.russian: Победите пиратов в игре Филе из пяти пальцев.
description.schinese: 在手指游戏中击败海盗。
description.turkish: Korsanları Parmak Arası Bıçak oyununda yen.

description.brazilian: Mude a direção das armas que estão viradas para a cabeça do cervo.
description.english: Change the direction of weapons that aim staghead.
description.german: Ändere die Richtung der Waffen, die auf den Hirschkopf zielen.
description.latam: Cambia la dirección de las armas que apuntan a la cabeza.
description.russian: Измените направление оружия, которое нацелено на голову оленя.
description.schinese: 改变瞄准鹿头的武器的方向。
description.turkish: Geyik başına bakan silahların yönünü değiştir.

description.brazilian: Encontre o responsável pelo sofrimento do Fantasma.
description.english: Find out who is responsible from Ghost's suffering.
description.german: Finde heraus, wer für das Leid des Geistes verantwortlich ist.
description.latam: Descubre quién es el responsable del sufrimiento de Ghost.
description.russian: Выясните, кто несет ответственность за страдания Призрака.
description.schinese: 找出谁该对鬼魂的苦痛负责
description.turkish: Hayaletin acı çekme sebebinin kim olduğunu bul.

description.brazilian: Não conte a Ozkanuguro sobre o vodu.
description.english: Don't tell Ozkanuguro anything about voodoo.
description.latam: No le digas nada a Ozkanuguro sobre el vudú.
description.russian: Не говорите Озканугуро ничего о вуду.
description.schinese: 不要告诉Ozkanuguro任何关于巫术的事情。
description.turkish: Ozkanuguru'ya voodoo hakkında hiçbir şey söyleme.

description.brazilian: Diga a Russ que Margaret aceitou a carta de amor.
description.english: Tell Russ that Margaret accepted the love letter.
description.german: Erzähle Russ, dass Margaret den Liebesbrief angenommen hat.
description.latam: Dile a Russ que Margaret aceptó la carta de amor.
description.russian: Скажите Рассу, что Маргарет приняла любовное письмо.
description.schinese: 告诉拉斯，玛格丽特接受了那封情书。
description.turkish: Russ'a, Margaret'ın mektubu kabul ettiğini söyle.

description.brazilian: Descubra o que aconteceu à Colônia Perdida.
description.english: Find out what happened to the Lost Colony.
description.german: Finde heraus, was der verlorenen Kolonie zugestoßen ist.
description.latam: Descubre lo que sucedió con la Colonia Perdida.
description.russian: Выясните, что случилось с Потерянной Колонией.
description.schinese: 找出失落殖民地的真相。
